short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes your tinnitus frequency from all browser audio to get constant notch therapy, lowering your tinnitus volume over time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ー Trying to do notch therapy yourself is annoying. ー

You have to find or pay for audio that’s been notched at your specific frequency, or notch it yourself.

To see results, you need to consistently listen to notched audio for hours a day and weeks at a time. This is not only inconvenient, but also boring if all you’re listening to is notched masking audio or the same songs over and over.

For these reasons it’s very hard to create a routine or habit around notch therapy, which is why I believe few people see any results from it. 

ー This extension makes it easier! ー

After installing this extension, your frequency will always be removed from any audio you hear, even when the popup menu is closed!

Whether you’re watching a YouTube video or scrolling on Facebook, you’ll still be getting notch therapy. 

I hope this makes notch therapy a lot less boring for you, and easier to make a habit of!

ー Please note ー

After a 30-day free trial, this extension will require a monthly subscription to continue using it.

ー Talk to me! ー

Have any questions, problems, or feedback, please let me know! 
My email is sam@samfaber.dev
